data.actual_result: "Send" button is greyed out while message is sending and for several seconds after the message is sent
data.short_description: Unable to send a second message while current message is sending in chat on poor connection
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're on poor connection - Send a message - While that message is still greyed out type out another message - Observe the "Send" button after typing out the second message
